data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Earnings Call Transcript
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligationsand Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we enclose the transcript of Analyst and Investor Conference Call for the quarter and financial year ended March 31, 2023 held on Friday, May 12, 2023. The link to access the transcript of the earnings conference call is:https://www.onwardgroup.com/investors/investors-reports/202223-iacall-may-12-2023-earnings-call-transcript.pdfAlso, the audio recording of the above Investor Conference on the financial results of the Company for the quarter and financial year ended March 31, 2023, has been uploaded on the website of the Company and following is the link: https://www.onwardgroup.com/investors/investors-reports/202223-iacall-may-12-2023-earnings-call-transcript.mp3

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On January 20, 2023
data.news_body:
1.Board of Directors of the Company have approved and taken on
record, unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter
ended December 31, 2022.
2. The Limited Review Reports of the Statutory Auditors on the aforesaid Consolidated & Standalone
Financial results.

data.caption: Results Along With Limited Review Report Of The Auditors Of The Company
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations,
2015 ('Listing Regulations'), the Board of Directors of the Company have approved and taken on
record, unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter
and half year ended September 30, 2022.
The Limited Review Reports of the Statutory Auditors on the aforesaid Consolidated & Standalone
Financial results.
